item.title: The HTC Desire 210, an entry-level dual SIM phone, is priced at less than S$160
item.description:
HTC will launch its budget-friendly smartphone, the HTC Desire 210, in Singapore on Wednesday, September 3, 2014. The phone will be sold through various retailers in two colors: Stealth Black and Polar White. A notable feature of the Desire 210 is its dual SIM card support, allowing users to manage personal and work profiles easily from a single device. Source: HTC. “The HTC Desire 210 brings impressive technology and design to the entry-level smartphone market,” stated Jack Yang, President of HTC South Asia...

item.title: Emirates introduces new flights to Istanbul's Sabiha Gokcen Airport
item.description:
Emirates now offers 18 flights to Istanbul every week, including a new daily service to Sabiha Gökçen Airport in addition to its existing flights to Istanbul Atatürk Airport. This makes Istanbul the third city after London and Tokyo to be served by Emirates from two airports. The new daily flight is operated with an Airbus A330-200, offering 12 First Class seats, 42 Business Class seats, and 183 Economy Class seats, and also provides up to 12 tonnes of cargo capacity each way...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/emirates-introduces-new-flights-to-istanbul-s-sabiha-gokcen-airport/

item.title: A new budget-friendly Lumia is about to be released
item.description:
Source: Microsoft. The Lumia 430. Microsoft has released the Lumia 430 Dual SIM, its most budget-friendly Lumia smartphone that can be upgraded to Windows 10*. Priced at approximately S$119, the Lumia 430 joins Microsoft’s affordable smartphone lineup alongside the Lumia 435, which features Lumia Camera. Equipped with Windows Phone 8.1, a Qualcomm Snapdragon processor with a 1.2GHz dual-core CPU, and pre-installed Microsoft Office, Skype, and OneDrive, the Lumia 430 Dual SIM enables users to be productive at work, enjoy entertainment, and stay connected while on the move...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/a-new-budget-friendly-lumia-is-about-to-be-released/

item.title: The HTC One E9+ dual sim will be available in Singapore starting August 29th
item.description:
Source: HTC. The HTC One E9+ dual sim in rose gold. HTC has introduced the HTC One E9+ dual sim in Singapore. This lightweight smartphone boasts a sizable 2K display and injects vibrant colors into the signature flagship design. “This latest addition to our HTC One E series capitalizes on the success of our flagship phones, offering both sophistication and style,” stated Faisal Siddiqui, President of HTC South Asia. “The HTC One E9+ dual sim represents a continuation of HTC’s commitment to innovation and design, showcasing a large 5...

item.title: HTC introduces the Desire 616 dual SIM smartphone for entry-level users
item.description:
HTC, a company known for mobile innovation and design, has introduced the HTC Desire 616 dual sim phone. This new phone offers high-end features at an affordable price. Source: HTC. “The HTC Desire 616 dual sim is a powerful phone with a great price tag,” says Jack Yang, President of HTC South Asia. “This new phone in the popular HTC Desire line offers an eight-core processor, fast processing speeds, and top-tier features at an accessible price, giving users a best-in-class experience...

item.title: HTC has launched the HTC Desire 826 dual sim, promising an exceptional mobile audio experience
item.description:
Source: HTC. The Blue Lagoon version. HTC is enhancing the mobile audio experience with its Desire 826 dual sim phone, featuring HTC BoomSound and Dolby Audio surround sound. This makes HTC the first smartphone manufacturer to integrate dual front-facing stereo speakers, a precisely adjusted sound profile, and Dolby’s decoding technology for a comprehensive multi-channel audio solution. This combination provides listeners with a level of audio depth and range not typically found in mobile devices...
